arguments.name: studios.channelPriority
arguments.description: When the studio type is unknown, and the name corresponds to both a channel & a network, whether to prefer the channel or the network

arguments.name: studios.uniqueNames
arguments.description: When the studio name corresponds to both a channel & a network, whether to append suffixes to the name to avoid conflicts

arguments.name: studios.channelSuffix
arguments.description: When returning a channel name that also corresponds to a network, will be appended to the name. WARNING: spaces between the name & suffix will not be automatically added

arguments.name: studios.networkSuffix
arguments.description: When returning a network name that also corresponds to a channel, will be appended to the name. WARNING: spaces between the name & suffix will not be automatically added

arguments.name: studios.whitelist
arguments.description: Array of data fields to pick (possible values: `'name', 'description', 'thumbnail', 'aliases', 'parent'`)

arguments.name: studios.blacklist
arguments.description: Array of data fields to omit (for values see whitelist)

arguments.name: studios.whitelistOverride
arguments.description: Array of data fields to pick, when values already exist from a piped plugin (WARNING: not the same thing as existing values of the scene) (for values see whitelist)

arguments.name: studios.blacklistOverride
arguments.description: Array of data fields to omit, when values already exist from a a piped plugin (WARNING: not the same thing as existing values of the scene) (for values see whitelist)
